title: New mouse, League not getting input
body:
I just bought a new g502 mouse and it doesn't seem to be registering in game. 

At fist i thought it was a PBE issue, but it's happening on live as well

anyone else have this problem?

replies.body:
Does your old mouse still function correctly on PBE? It's possible it's not getting picked up correctly, or your config settings for PBE aren't working correctly. Let's try giving those config files a quick reset to check.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to ~~C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\~~ Wherever you installed the PBE client
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8xO1n6Ba,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-25T01:22:15.443+0000)
>
> Does your old mouse still function correctly on PBE? It's possible it's not getting picked up correctly, or your config settings for PBE aren't working correctly. Let's try giving those config files a quick reset to check.
> 
> - Log into the game client
> - Navigate to ~~C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\~~ Wherever you installed the PBE client
> - Delete the folder named **Config**
> - Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
> - Leave game to sync settings

ok, a simple restart fixed it.

> - Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly.

should i try live? It's the same problem there

Edit: I also forgot to mention, that my keyboard doesn't seem to be working as well. That's still the same
